export const isValidEmail = email => /^\w+([\.-]?\w+)*@\w+([\.-]?\w+)*(\.\w{2,3})+$/.test(email);
export const capitalize = text => text.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + text.slice(1);

sourcesContent:
export const isValidEmail = email => /^\w+([\.-]?\w+)*@\w+([\.-]?\w+)*(\.\w{2,3})+$/.test(email);
export const capitalize = text => text.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + text.slice(1);
